channel.title: [Feedback pls :)] Show Off
channel.description:
Hello everyone, my name is Adi and two days ago i've started to mess with sprites .... and i've done a few things till now, tell me what you think about it please :)
[IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/t5ni9k.png[/img]
PS: it's my first experience with sprites !
Will keep you up to date asap i get done more sprites. If you like them and have ideas for new sprites leave a comment here. Thanks ! :)

item.title: [Feedback pls :)] Show Off
item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

Soulcist:

These are nice looking for RSC but why add this? It’ll confuse the Hell out of people with all the sprites and what would be what. I know you can hover over the item and it tell you the name but all those names would confuse some people. Regardless of that, it’s still nice and I think it’s impressive as well.

Thanks for feedback, and to answer your question I am working to release a new server and im willing to make it more than 35% custom with new features… that will take alot of time but im working on it like 4h/day and it’s going well till now. The new look for items it’s just to give an unique face for my server. Also there will be some new skills too like runecrafting, slayer, will try make new quests and remove the old ones and much more. Ofc i will make a topic on mopar whens the time … i think it will be rdy for beta test in aprox. 3-4 months

Read full topic

item.title: [Feedback pls :)] Show Off
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

For rsc, small details do not show up cuz of obvious reason.
If you make a detail, make the outlining very obvious.

Read full topic

item.description:

Keep it up. next time tell us what they are when you post them. lol

~K!zL

item.title: [Feedback pls :)] Show Off
item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

Well what i wanted to do is :

  • Black pumpkin
  • Catfish raw & cooked
  • Sturgeon raw & cooked
  • Carp raw & cooked
  • Coins

I rly appreciate your feedback, and i know is not the best sprites you’ve seen but like i said i started messing with sprites 3 days ago so i will improve my skills asap

What about those? I tried to make a new look for woods and some jewels

There are again the jewels and a new herb + a new version for limpwurt root
